text: Associação Atlética Moreninhas, commonly known as Moreninhas, is a men's and women's Brazilian football team based in Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul state. The women's team competed in the Copa do Brasil de Futebol Feminino once. ==History== The club was founded on March 5, 1994. ===Women's team=== Moreninhas competed in the Copa do Brasil de Futebol Feminino in 2008, when they were eliminated in the Second Round by Aliança. ==Stadium== Associação Atlética Moreninhas play their home games at Estádio Jacques da Luz, nicknamed Estádio das Moreninhas and Estádio Toca do Leão. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 4,500 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1994 Category:Football clubs in Mato Grosso do Sul Category:Women's football clubs in Brazil Category:1994 establishments in Brazil
title: Associação Atlética Moreninhas
